message_1: Suppose you want to send a secret message "110101" to your friend using the one-time pad encryption method. You have the key "101001". What will be the encrypted message that you send to your friend? Show your work.
message_2:
To encrypt the message using the one-time pad encryption method, we need to perform a bitwise XOR operation between the message and the key.

Message: 110101
Key:    101001

Perform XOR operation:

1 XOR 1 = 0
1 XOR 0 = 1
0 XOR 1 = 1
1 XOR 0 = 1
0 XOR 0 = 0
1 XOR 1 = 0

Encrypted message: 011100

So, the encrypted message that you send to your friend is "011100".
